content.en: Signal demodulation algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve the demodulation of signals in optical fiber sensors. These algorithms, such as the improved PGC algorithm, the PGC-AD-DSM algorithm, and the self-calibration PGC-Arctan algorithm, are designed to eliminate various disturbances and distortions, such as light intensity disturbance and harmonic distortion. By implementing these algorithms, the researchers aim to achieve higher stability, lower distortion, and improved system performance in fiber-optic interferometric sensors.
content.da: Signal demodulation algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre demodulationen af signaler i optiske fibersensorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom den forbedrede PGC-algoritme, PGC-AD-DSM-algoritmen og selvkalibrerings PGC-Arctan algoritmen, er designet til at eliminere forskellige forstyrrelser og forvrængninger, såsom lysintensitetsforstyrrelse og harmonisk forvrængning. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at opnå højere stabilitet, lavere forvrængning og forbedret systemydelse i fiberoptiske interferometriske sensorer.
